info.name: APB forum minimal customizable
info.description:
https://userstyles.org/styles/160519/apb-forum-minimal-v2

but customizable

You may have to delete the style before customizing it - and reinstall it after finishing customization. (a nause, I know)
Tobii said Ctrl+F5 should work too

The screenshot here is brighter -
the defaults are close to Tobiis version
